name: Oscillation (pedr0silva)
description:
Winner of the IPCA gamejam 2020.

[A] [D] to move.
[SPACE] to jump.
[ALT+F4] to close.

Art by Mike Almeida
/ https://www.artstation.com/mikejimmy
/ https://www.instagram.com/mikejim__/
_____________________________________________

Design and programming by me

A special thanks to Nelson Gonçalves.

Have a nice day.
